title: Mazhai Vara Pogudhe Lyrics Yennai Arindhaal Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Mazhai Vara Pogudhey Lyrics From Yennai Arindhaal
Singers : Karthik
Lyrics : Thamarai

Mazhai Vara Pogudhae
thuligalum thoorudhey
nanayaamal enna seiven.

Malarvanam oodudhey
madhuramum oorudhey
tholayaamal engae poven

oh ho..
pugai pola venpanjaai
midhakindra en nenjai
edhai seidhu meetpaen
evar solli kaetpen.

Kadal pondra kannaale
enai vaari sendraale
ilandheney indru
irundhaalum nandru

analmele konjam
punalmele konjam
thadumaari nirkkum
en nenjam.

Mazhai Vara Pogudhae
thuligalum thoorudhey
nanayaamal enna seiven.

Malarvanam oodudhey
madhuramum oorudhey
tholayaamal engae poven
oh ho..

Karu karu kangalaal
kayalvizhiyil kolgiraal
valiththaalum yaedho sugam.

Kulivilum kannaththil
kudiyiru engiraai
vilayillaa aayul varam
oh ho
nila thoongum neraththil
kanaa kaanu neraththil
avalthaane vandhaal
anaikkaamal sendraal

oh
imai rendum moodaadhu
urakkangal varaadhu
adhai kadhal endraal
avalthaane thandhaal

Marandhaalum unnai
kadandhaalum pinne
manamengum aval niyabagam

Kannai katti vittaalkooda
pattaampoochi poovai thaedum
mazhai endraal mannai thaane
vandhu serum.

Ai endhapakkam nirikkindraayo
andha pakkam kangal pogum
munnum pinnum nee nadandhaal
oojalaadum.

Sulalum mayil nee
un thogai enthozhil
sugamaai puralum
paarpaen en vazhnaalil.

Mazhai Vara Pogudhae
thuligalum thoorudhey
nanayaamal enna seiven.

Malarvanam oodudhey
madhuramum oorudhey
tholayaamal engae poven
oh ho..

pugai pola venpanjaai
midhakindra en nenjai
edhai seidhu meetpaen
evar solli kaetpen.

Kadal pondra kannaale
enai vaari sendraale
ilandheney indru
irundhaalum nandru

analmele konjam
punalmele konjam
thadumaari nirkkum
en nenjam.
